backend.name: agent-arch-api
backend.manualDeploy: cd backend && docker build -t agentarchacr.azurecr.io/agent-arch-api:latest . && az acr login --name agentarchacr && docker push agentarchacr.azurecr.io/agent-arch-api:latest && az containerapp update --name agent-arch-api --resource-group rg-agent-architecture --image agentarchacr.azurecr.io/agent-arch-api:latest

frontend.name: agent-arch-web-prod
frontend.manualDeploy: cd frontend && npm run build && cp staticwebapp.config.json out/ && npx swa deploy out --deployment-token <TOKEN> --env production
